message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. It comes with a wide range of features that cater to various needs, making it an invaluable asset. I understand that the true value of this product might be subjective, but based on its quality and market demand, I believe it's worth considering a purchase price of $1500000. I look forward to discussing this opportunity with you further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and would allow me to make a more informed decision. I'm willing to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What are your thoughts on this counteroffer?
